page.title: 08The Grampound Fete
page.content: There are several fetes held in the village through the year.All the organisations try to raise money by having a fete.The biggest fete is the village fete.This is when all the clubs join together to raise money for the village hall.The hall is used for lots of things.The Brownies meet there and the over 60 club. Each club runs a stall.The school has a different stall every year.The football club always has a bottle stall.At a bottle stall you buy tickets and hope the ticket has a 5 at the end of its number.If it has a 5 you win a prize.If I win it is usually bottle of sauce but I would like to win a bottle of whisky to give to my Dad.The other stalls are cake stall, plant stall, book stall, hoop-la, treasure hunt, bric-a-brac and refreshments.
